problem: 如图,△ABC≌△DCB,点A、B的对应顶点分别为点D、C,如果AB=7cm,BC=12cm,AC=9cm,那么BD的长是()．
answer: 解:∵△ABC≌△DCB,A、B的对应顶点分别为点D、C,∴BD=CA,∵AC=9cm∴BD=9cm.故选B.
comment: 此题考查了全等三角形的性质.此题比较简单,解题的关键是注意掌握全等三角形的对应边相等,注意对应关系.
problem_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC ≌ △DCB, the corresponding vertices of points A and B are points D and C, respectively. If AB = N_0, BC = N_1, AC = N_2, then the length of BD is ()
